Text: this girl is awesome. thought she was french though...

Oh, and for anyone needing to join several screenshots into a single picture in linux, install the imagemagick package and use:

montage *.png -background black -geometry +1+1 -tile 2x outputfiilename.jpg

(Hope no chars are stripped.)  -geometry +1+1 means 1 pixel spacing between pix, -tile 2x means two columns, the rest should be obvious :)
